name: Daryl Barnett
briefIntro: Director of Sales and Marketing at Republik Media | Strategic Mastermind
fullBio: Specialising in Digital Marketing and Growth Hacking I look for businesses that I can make a huge impact on by improving their digital platforms, user experience and marketing strategy. Our clients trust me to provide customised expert advice and solutions, as I believe that our interests are best served when our clients' long-term objectives are achieved.
